usefulItems: fine mesh sieve, cling wrap, jars (6 oz), refrigerator
title: Mint Chocolate Pudding Cups

ingredients.content: 20 fresh mint leaves, plus extra to garnish
6 ½ oz chocolate sandwich cookies with cream filling

preparations.content: Place whipping cream, corn starch, mint, sugar, egg yolks and salt into mixing bowl and cook <b>12 min/195°F/speed 3<b>.
Add butter and blend <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>-6<b>, increasing speed gradually.
Strain cream mixture into a bowl through a fine mesh sieve, cover with cling wrap and refrigerate until set (approx. 2 hr.). Clean mixing bowl.
Place butter into mixing bowl and melt <b>2 min/170°F/speed <b>.

Add cookies and grind <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and grind a further <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Set aside one quarter of the crumb mixture, to garnish. Divide remaining crumb mixture between jars (6 oz) and press down gently to form crusts. Refrigerate while making whipped cream. Clean mixing bowl.
Just before serving, <b>insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place whipping cream and sugar into mixing bowl and whip <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 3<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk.<b>
Divide chilled Mint Pudding over Cookie Crust in jars. Top with whipped cream, garnish with mint leaves and sprinkle with reserved cookie crumb mixture. Serve chilled.
